actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to provide that payments made under the aid to families with dependent children program may be reduced in the case of a dependent child who lives in a home in which a relative not eligible for aid under such title is also residing.

summary.text: Amends Title IV (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) of the Social Security Act to reduce payments made under such title in the case of a dependent child who lives in a home in which a relative who is either not legally responsible for the support of such child or is not eligible for aid under such title is also residing.

titles.title: A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to provide that payments made under the aid to families with dependent children program may be reduced in the case of a dependent child who lives in a home in which a relative not eligible for aid under such title is also residing.
